   atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ	aTa Kalu AyuzmAn SAriputraH tasyAm velAyAm tuzwaH udagre Atta manAH
   pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavato	pramuditaH prIti sOmanasya jAtaH yena BagavAn= tena aQjalim praNamya BagavataH 
   'bhimukho bhagavantameva vyavalokayamāno bhagavantametadavocat  	aBimuKaH Bagavantam eva vyavalokayamAnaH Bagavantam etat avocat  
   āścaryādbhutaprāpto 'smi bhagavan audbilyaprāptaḥ idamevaṃrūpaṃ bhagavato	AScarya adButa prAptaH asmi Bagavan Odbilya prAptaH idam evaMrUpam BagavataH 
   'ntikād ghoṣaṃ śrutvā | tatkasya hetoḥ? aśrutvaiva tāvadahaṃ bhagavan	antikAt Gozam SrutvA | tat kasya hetoH? aSrutvA eva tAvat aham Bagavan
   idamevaṃrūpaṃ bhagavato 'ntikād dharmaṃ tadanyān bodhisattvān dṛṣṭvā	idam evaMrUpam BagavataH antikAt Darmam tad anyAn boDisattvAn dRzwvA
   bodhisattvānāṃ ca anāgate 'dhvani buddhanāma śrutvā atīva śocāmi atīva	boDisattvAnAm ca anAgate aDvani budDa nAma SrutvA atIva SocAmi atIva
   saṃtapye, bhraṣṭo 'smyevaṃrūpāt tathāgatajñānagocarād jñānadarśanāt | yadā	saMtapye, BrazwaH asmi evaMrUpAt taTAgata jQAna gocarAt jQAna darSanAt | yadA
   cāhaṃ bhagavan abhīkṣṇaṃ gacchāmi parvatagirikandarāṇi	ca aham Bagavan aBIkzNam gacCAmi parvata giri kandarANi

   yadbhūyastvena anenaiva vihāreṇa viharāmi | tulye nāma dharmadhātupraveśe	yat BUyaH tvena anena eva vihAreNa viharAmi | tulye nAma DarmaDAtu praveSe
   vayaṃ bhagavatā hīnena yānena niryātitāḥ | evaṃ ca me bhagavaṃstasmin	vayam BagavatA hInena yAnena niryAtitAH | evam ca me Bagavan= tasmin
   samaye bhavati   asmākamevaiṣo 'parādhaḥ, naiva bhagavato 'parādhaḥ |	samaye Bavati  asmAkam eva ezaH aparADaH, na eva BagavataH aparADaH |
   tatkasya hetoḥ? sacedbhagavānasmābhiḥ pratīkṣitaḥ syāt sāmutkarṣikīṃ	tat kasya hetoH? saced BagavAn asmABiH pratIkzitaH syAt sAmutkarzikIm
   dharmadeśanāṃ kathayamānaḥ, yadidamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya,	Darma deSanAm kaTayamAnaH, yat idam anuttarAm samyaksaMboDim AraBya,
   teṣveva vayaṃ bhagavan dharmeṣu niryātāḥ syāma | yatpunarbhagavan	tezu eva vayam Bagavan Darmezu niryAtAH syAma | yat punar Bagavan
   asmābhiranupasthiteṣu bodhisattveṣu saṃdhābhāṣyaṃ bhagavato	asmABiH anupasTitezu boDisattvezu saMDA BAzyam BagavataH 
   'jānamānaistvaramāṇaiḥ prathamabhāṣitaiva tathāgatasya dharmadeśanā	ajAnamAnEH tvaramANEH praTama BAzitA eva taTAgatasya Darma deSanA
   śrutvodgṛhītā dhāritā bhāvitā cintitā manasikṛtā | so 'haṃ bhagavan	SrutvA udgRhItA DAritA BAvitA cintitAH manasikRtA | saH aham Bagavan
   ātmaparibhāṣaṇayaiva bhūyiṣṭhena rātriṃdivānyatināmayāmi | adyāsmi	Atma pariBAzaNayA eva BUyizWena rAtriMdivAni atinAmayAmi | adya asmi
   bhagavan nirvāṇaprāptaḥ | adyāsmi bhagavan parinirvṛtaḥ | adya me bhagavan	Bagavat nirvANa prAptaH | adya asmi Bagavan parinirvRtaH | adya me Bagavan
   arhattvaṃ prāptam | adyāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavataḥ putro jyeṣṭha auraso	arhat tvam prAptam | adya aham Bagavan BagavataH putraH jyezWa OrasaH 
   mukhato jāto dharmajo dharmanirmito dharmadāyādo dharmanirvṛttaḥ |	muKataH jAtaH DarmajaH Darma nirmitaH Darma dAyAdaH Darma nirvRttaH |
   apagataparidāho 'smyadya bhagavan imamevaṃrūpamadbhutadharmamaśrutapūrvaṃ	apagata paridAhaH asmi adya Bagavan imam evaMrUpam adButa Darmam aSruta pUrvam
   bhagavato 'ntikād ghoṣaṃ śrutvā ||	BagavataH antikAt Gozam SrutvA ||

   kathaṃkathā mahya na bhūya kācit paripācito 'haṃ iha agrayāne //	kaTaMkaTA mahya na BUya kAcid paripAcitaH aham iha agra yAne //

   dṛṣṭvā ca tvāṃ lokahitānukampī divāvihāraṃ parigamya caikaḥ /	dRzwvA ca tvAm loka hita anukampI divAvihAram parigamya ca ekaH /
   hā vañcito 'smīti vicintayāmi asaṅgajñānātu acintiyātaḥ // Saddhp_3.7 //	hA vaQcitaH asmi iti vicintayAmi asaFga jQAnAtu acintiyAtaH // Sat Dp _3.7 //
   rātriṃdivāni kṣapayāmi nātha bhūyiṣṭha so eva vicintayantaḥ /	rAtriMdivAni kzapayAmi nATa BUyizWa saH eva vicintayantaH /
   pṛcchāmi tāvad bhagavantameva bhraṣṭo 'hamasmītyatha vā na veti //	pRcCAmi tAvat Bagavantam eva BrazwaH aham asmi iti aTa vA na vA iti //

   (Vaidya 48) vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ	(VEdyaH 48) vidyA caraNa saMpannaH sugataH loka vid anuttaraH
